text:
Christine Tremarco (born 20 September 1977) is a English television and film actress, whose career began in 1992.
She is perhaps most famous, for her role in the BBC One school-based drama series, "Waterloo Road", as school secretary and learning support assistant, Davina Shackleton, a role she portrayed regularly from 2007 to 2009.
In 2010, Tremarco guest starred in the BBC medical drama, "Casualty", as Linda Andrews. Following a positive response to the character, she was reintroduced as a regular character, in 2011. Tremarco left the series in 2013.
